### getPassName() {#a411506e20769ad13d80ca4347ca471ed}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="StringRef R600AsmPrinter::getPassName () const"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
getPassName - Return a nice clean name for a pass.

This usually implemented in terms of the name that is registered by one of the Registration templates, but can be overloaded directly.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600asmprinter-h/#l00026">26</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600asmprinter-h">R600AsmPrinter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600asmprinter-cpp/#l00040">40</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600asmprinter-cpp">R600AsmPrinter.cpp</a>.

### lowerConstant() {#afe4138f88f9d7e4184507afec6a3b00f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const MCExpr &#42; R600AsmPrinter::lowerConstant (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42; CV)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Lower the specified LLVM <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> to an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a>.

The AsmPrinter::lowerConstantof does not know how to lower addrspacecast, therefore they should be lowered by this function.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600asmprinter-h/#l00033">33</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600asmprinter-h">R600AsmPrinter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600mcinstlower-cpp/#l00075">75</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600mcinstlower-cpp">R600MCInstLower.cpp</a>.
